summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Public Health Department; authorizing an agreement with the Department of Human Resources as King County's Area Agency on Aging for financial assistance for the operation of a model screening clinic program establishing certain postions and increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1977 Budget of the Public Health Department; authorizing the charging and collecting of fees and voluntary donations for health and counseling services, and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
